common_issues.title: Non-dismissable overlay message, blocking Pieces app
common_issues.description: Users report a non-dismissable overlay message appearing in the Pieces desktop app on Windows. The message lacks clarity and prevents interaction with the app.  This may occur after a background update. Restarting the computer is the only known workaround.  Requesting investigation into the message's cause and a fix to make it dismissable.

related_issues.title: Non-dismissable overlay message.
related_issues.text:
Non-dismissable overlay message.
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

v11.0.4

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

My Pieces app launches at Windows startup (intended). Sometimes, (possibly after a background update?), this dialog appears on my desktop. I don't know what it means, exactly, but I cannot click "Ok" and there is no other way to dismiss it. My only option appears to be to restart the computer, which is often impractical. Please fix!

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f231ef56-3d59-4e94-8cb5-2b54249900cc)
## GitHub Issue Summary: "Unable to launch Pieces Windows Desktop Version"

**Key Point:** User @ThemePark reported being unable to launch the Windows Desktop version of the Pieces app despite having installed Pieces Suite, OS, and Desktop.

**Problem Identified:** The exact cause is initially unclear but potentially related to Windows version compatibility.

**Solution Proposed/Implemented:** 
1. Support bot suggests checking related issues and documentation.
2. @mack-at-pieces asks for Window version and confirmation of installed components.
3. @ThemePark confirms Windows 10 and installed components.
 
**Outcome/Current Status:**
- The user hasn't provided further information, so the issue remains open.
- It's unclear whether the problem has been resolved.

**Follow-up needed:**
1. @mack-at-pieces could ask for further details about the error message or specific troubleshooting steps taken.
2. Encourage @ThemePark to provide additional information for further diagnosis and resolution.

recommendations: Investigate the root cause of the non-dismissable overlay message bug in the Pieces desktop app for Windows.
Update the overlay message to be more informative and provide clear instructions for users.
Implement a way to dismiss the overlay message without requiring a system restart.
Prioritize responding to ticket #590 and provide a solution or workaround to the affected user.
Consider creating a dedicated FAQ or troubleshooting guide for common issues like the non-dismissable overlay message.
